text1:
This is my first work.
It's a simple blog created with Next.js, using microCMS as the backend (headless CMS).
It includes features such as language switching, dark mode,
and category/monthly views.
I wanted to create a website from scratch with Next.js.
techUsed: techUsed: Next.js, microCMS, i18next, next-themes, highlight.js, tailwind, typescript, etc
